title: Crew Show! (Vantage F1, Tom Sergura trip, Q&A)
description:
On this crew show, Matt tells us about spending the weekend with Tom Segura on tour! He saw the shows, explored Seattle, and got a glimpse of life on the road. We've also been driving the Aston Martin Vantage F1 Edition, which makes us think of the AMG GT (and certain 911s). Q&A includes personal luxury coupes, track tires, best track toy under $40k, watch advice, and even a bit of career advice. 

This show was recorded on 10/18/2021. 

For a limited time, my listeners get their first month free - and, after you’ve been a member, CrowdHealth will include a Fitness Wearable. That’s 30 days to try risk-free plus the Fitness Wearable. Just go to http://www.joincrowdhealth.com/fit and enter code Tire at sign up. 

When you purchase a 3-month Babbel subscription, you’ll get an additional 3 months for free. Just go to http://www.BABBEL. com and use promo code TIRE. 

Go to http://www.blackvue.com/TST and use the promo code TIRE to get 10% off of any BlackVue dashcam. Free shipping for orders over $200. 

Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app now, use promo code TIRE, bet $1 on this Sunday’s Formula Racing Grand Prix and win $100 in free bets if any driver finishes a lap. 

 

Want early access to this episode? To watch the live stream? Bonus shows, or ad-free shows? Join our Patreon! Go to https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast and check out the tiers. It all starts at just $3/month! 

Follow us! 

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman 

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

 

Click here for the most honest car reviews out there: https://www.youtube.com/thesmokingtire Want shorter podcasts? Subscribe to our new CLIPS channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD4WGV-W5zD1MK4yHbNGwmw
